items.title: Pinned: A Potential Academic Dishonesty
items.content: The First Author of our AAAI'26 paper (i.e., Zhendong) reported that this paper was revised by a HYPOCRITE (i.e., me). I'm sorry to be involved in this (potential) academic dishoinsty.

items.title: AAAI'26 Paper Accepted
items.content: Our paper "Pricing Online LLM Services with Data-Calibrated Stackelberg Routing Game" was accepted by AAAI for oral presentation (17.6% acceptance rate). Congratulations to Zhendong!

items.title: National Scholarship Awarded
items.content: Received the National Scholarship (CNY 30,000) from the Ministry of Education of China.

items.title: SIGMOD'25 Conference in Berlin
items.content: Presented "Rule-Based Data Cleaning with GPUs on a Single Machine" and demonstrated MiniClean system at SIGMOD in Berlin, Germany. First time visiting Europe - exciting experience!

items.title: SIGMOD'25 Student Travel Award
items.content: Received the SIGMOD'25 Student Travel Award (USD 1,800) to attend and present at the SIGMOD conference.

items.title: SIGMOD'25 Demo Paper Accepted
items.content: Our paper "MiniClean: A Single-Machine System for Cleaning Big Graphs" was accepted by SIGMOD Demo Proposals. Grateful to all collaborators!

items.title: SIGMOD'25 Paper Accepted
items.content: Our paper "Rule-Based Data Cleaning with GPUs on a Single Machine" was accepted by SIGMOD! This marks my first first-author paper. Thank you to all collaborators!

items.title: Joined Shenzhen Institute of Computing Sciences
items.content: Started as a research intern at Shenzhen Institute of Computing Sciences. An exciting journey begins!

items.title: PhD Program Started
items.content: Began my PhD program at Southeast University. Let the research journey begin!
